alert.note: Alert for Gallatin; Wayne; White (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 18 at 8:54PM CST until further notice by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Illinois... Little Wabash River at Carmi. .Heavy rainfall on Thursday has caused the river to rise. Minor flooding is expected to begin Saturday evening. Heavy rainfall expected next week will likely keep water levels above flood stage for the foreseeable future. For the Little Wabash River...including Carmi...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY EVENING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Little Wabash River at Carmi. * WHEN...From Saturday evening until further notice. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:30 PM CST Friday the stage was 26.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late tomorrow evening and continue rising to a crest of 30.0 feet Wednesday evening. - Flood stage is 27.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Stay tuned to further developments by listening to your local radio, television, or NOAA Weather Radio for further information. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
